text: Stephen Crawford Young Jr. (born 11 December 1956) is a Scottish musician. He is the rhythm guitarist and backing vocalist for the Australian hard rock band AC/DC. He officially joined the band in September 2014. He replaced his uncle, Malcolm Young who retired due to dementia. He had also filled in for Malcolm during AC/DC's 1988 US tour. Young was born in Glasgow. In 1963, he moved with his family to Australia. He returned to Scotland in 1970. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:AC/DC members Category:British rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Glasgow Category:Scottish rock musicians
